description:
2-wheeled freedom for smile-inducing commutes and weekend getaways. Equipped with Shimano's Sora drivetrain, hydraulic disc brakes, an aluminum frame and a carbon fork the Quick 2 lives up to its name. Its geometry strikes a brilliant balance of riding comfort and pedaling efficiency, making this bike a beautiful choice for active urbanites.

  • Smartform C3 alloy frame and carbon fork, with relaxed geometry
  • 9-speed drivetrain pairs a 50/34T chain ring with an 11-34T cassette
  • Shimano Sora groupset with an FSA Tempo crank
  • Hydraulic disc brakes
  • Double-wall alloy rims
  • 360º reflective details on the frame and tires help keep you seen
  • Rack and fender mounts
  • Easy rolling Schwalbe Spicer tires have great traction and K-Guard puncture protection belt to prevent flats
  • Wheel sensor pairs with your phone via the free Cannondale app and uses Garmin™ technology to record your rides, provide your: time, speed, distance, calories, etc. and it even tells you about your carbon offset. The app also provides reminders for needed services, tracks service history and more
  • Wheel sensor works with ANT+® or Bluetooth® and uses an easily replaceable 2032 battery that lasts more than a year
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Quick Disc 2 Bicycle - Unisex
